definition: to go down by degrees/progressively decreasing
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: Repeat this pattern for each successively lower level of Packages.
sentences.chinese: 爲包的每個遞降層級重複執行這一模式。

sentences.english: Chen Wang Qian Zhong said to send someone to degradation.
sentences.chinese: 錢忠說陳王派人來遞降表。
